## Interview with Dr. Rachel Park, Neuroscientist and Tinnitus Expert

Q: Welcome, Dr. Park! Can you tell us about your background and how you became a neuroscientist and tinnitus expert?

A: Thank you for having me! I've always been fascinated by the brain and its intricacies, which led me to pursue a PhD in Neuroscience. During my postdoctoral fellowship, I focused on tinnitus, a condition that affects millions of people worldwide. I've since dedicated my career to understanding tinnitus and developing effective treatments.
